summary: A biography of the Three Stooges, in which their careers and rise to fame is shown throughout the eyes of their leader, Moe Howard.
cast: Paul Ben-Victor|Evan Handler|John Kassir|Michael Chiklis|Rachael Blake|Anna Lise Phillips|Jeanette Cronin|Joel Edgerton|Marton Csokas|Linal Haft|Brandon Burke|Lewis Fitz-Gerald|Peter Callan|Laurence Coy|Phillip Hinton|Peter Whitford|David Whitford|Harry Weiss|Buster Skeggs|Jillian O'Dowd|Olivia Pigeot|Zoe Coyle|Helen Dallimore|Peter Scarf|Douglas Blaikie|Shaun Loseby|Lisa Reynolds|David Downer|Michael Gregory|David Baldwin|Len Kaserman|Sally Clark|Geoff Bartlett|Gary Baxter|Martin Pashley|Gunther Berghofer|Chris Burke|Murray Bartlett|Pippa Grandison|Tamsin Carroll|David Jobling|Frank McNamara|John Batchelor|Peter Meisel|George Leppard|Alan Zitner|Alastair Duncan|Trent Atkinson|Christopher James Baker|Cass Cumerford|Brenda De Lacy
title: The Three Stooges
